# Hotfix PR

## Incident

Summary of the incident/production impact and severity.

## Fix

What was changed for quick mitigation.

## Production Validation

How to verify the fix in production.

## Follow-up

Follow-up tasks for thorough/long-term remediation.

## Checklist

- [ ] Targeted to the correct release branch
- [ ] Minimal risk & smoke tested
- [ ] Communication to stakeholders completed
- [ ] Clear rollback plan
